mapper.select: select p.party_id, p.name, p.introduction, p.introduction_image , p.banner_image, p.exercise_category , count(m.party_member_id) as member_count from party p left join party_member m on p.party_id = m.party_id group by p.party_id order by member_count desc
mapper.insert: insert into party(name, introduction, introduction_image, banner_image, exercise_category, party_type) values(#{name}, #{introduction}, #{introductionImage}, #{bannerImage},#{exerciseCategory}, #{partyType})
